articles.description: Lisa Marie Presley loves Baz Luhrmann's forthcoming film about her legendary father, singer Elvis Presley, and believes her late son would have as well.

articles.author: Perry Carpenter
articles.title: 'NCIS: Hawai'i' Star Yasmine Al-Bustami Has 1 Wish for the Rest of the Season — 'Can We All Pray for Kacy to Finally Get Their S*** Together?' [Exclusive] - Showbiz Cheat Sheet
articles.description: ‘NCIS: Hawai’i’ star Yasmine Al-Bustami opened up to Showbiz Cheat Sheet about her wishes for ‘Kacy’ in the spinoff’s first season finale.
articles.content: NCIS: Hawai’i is close to wrapping it’s inaugural season. And Agents Kate Whistler and Lucy Tara are still not an official couple. The spinoff’s marquee relationship — which has been dubbed “Kacy” — … [+3430 chars]

articles.author: David Averre
articles.title: Ukrainian soldier trapped in tunnels of Azovstal gives rendition of Eurovision winning-song - Daily Mail
articles.description: 'Stefania' was written as a tribute to a band member's mother, but has transformed into a war anthem since Russia's invasion. The song stormed to victory at Eurovision song contest.
articles.content: Footage has emerged of a defiant Ukrainian soldier at Mariupol's Azovstal steel plant singing a rendition of the Eurovision-winning song 'Stefania', even as the explosions of Russian bombs thundered … [+5912 chars]
